name: WEED
description: WEED - an unusual match3 game with beautiful anime graphics and interesting light casual gameplay. Move the lines! Play with match3 with a sexy anime girl. Line up and win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3 Ghz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card Storage: 400 MB available space
